features.backgroundFeatures:
--- Criminal Contact ---
You have a reliable and trustworthy contact who acts as your liaison to a network of other criminals. You know how to get messages to and from your contact, even over great distances; specifically, you know the local messengers, corrupt caravan masters, and seedy sailors who can deliver messages for you.
Specialty: hired killer
features.classFeatures:
--- Expertise ---
Thieves' tools

--- Sneak Attack ---
5d6

--- Thieves' Cant ---

--- Cunning Action ---
Dash, Disengage, Hide

--- Uncanny Dodge ---
Reaction to halve the damage from one attack

--- Evasion ---
Half damage on failed DEX save, no damage on a success

--- Assassinate ---
Advantage on attacks against any creature that hasn't taken a turn yet in combat
Any hit on a surprised creature is a critical hit

--- Infiltration Expertise
7 days and 25 GP to establish a false identity which can be adopted as a disguise any time after
Creatures believe you to be that person until given an obvious reason not to
features.otherFeatures:
--- Languages ---

Elvish
Thieves' Cant

Thieves' tools
Disguise kit
Poisoner's kit
features.raceFeatures:
--- Darkvision ---
60 ft.

--- Fangs ---
Can be used as unarmed strikes
Deal 1d4 + STR piercing damage
As an action against a grappled, incapacitated, or restrained creature, drink their blood to gain temporary hit points equal to CHA mod

--- Fey Ancestry ---
Advantage on saving throws against being charmed
Cannot be put to sleep by magic

notes.notes1:
Has minor knowledge about The Eye

Worked in as an assassin in the Bloodstone Lands for several years
